description:
Year of release: 1967
Production: Gorky Film Studio
Genre: Drama
Running time: 104 minutes

Director: Alexander Askol'dov

Cast: Nonna Mordjukova, Rolan Bykov, Raisa Nedashkovskaya, Lyudmila Volyn, Basil SHukshin, Luba Katz, Pavlik Levin, Dima Kleiman, Martha Bratkova, Igor Fishman, Sergey Nikonenko Otar Koberidze, Leonid Reutov, Victor Shahs.

Description: A female commissar named Vavilova has to leave her detachment. She is expecting a baby ... Settling into a large Jewish family of a craftsman and observing the everyday nonsense of those poor but kindhearted people, Madame Vavilov, as she is called by family, Yefim Magazannik, discovers a hitherto unknown world of human joys and happiness of motherhood and family life ...

Extras. Information: "The Golden Disc" in 2005 in the category "Best Restoration on DVD".
Filmed from a shelf over twenty years during the International Film Festival in Moscow (1987) and is shown in Prokom. In rolling out - in 1988, and this year is rolled abroad. Special Jury Prize at Berlin Film Festival "Silver Bear in Berlin." Prize Otto Dibelius international evangelical jury - in West Berlin International Film Festival-88, Prize of the jury of the international Catholic organization of cinematographic and audiovisual media (OSIK). Composer Alfred Schnittke. Based on the story of Vasily Grossman's "In the city of Berdichev."
